author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Prevent saving and overwriting preconstructed decks.

comments.body: There is support for more folders in the decks folder - maybe having a \decks\preconstructed folder within it, keeping the default save folder in \decks. Would help accidental overwriting.
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body:
I have just published changes that recognize "prebuilt" directory in "\decks" as reserved and will prevent user saving decks to this location. Also, it now asks for confirmation if user attempts to overwrite existing dec file.

For this to be effective the existing "dec" files will need to be moved into the "\decks\prebuilt" directory.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
